title: What we do hits HOME at Vermillion Apartments! 3 Bedroom Apt Available
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Our 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes include spacious bedrooms with ample closet space, central air-conditioning, vaulted ceilings, vinyl wood planking & carpet flooring, and fully equipped kitchens!
Located just a short drive from Downtown Houston, near many dining, shopping, and entertainment options right outside of your front door.
Our community offers a sparkling outdoor pool, picnic & BBQ areas, outdoor playground, on-site laundry, & ample parking lot space!
Call our on-site professional management team TODAY to discuss coming in for a tour!
- New Walking Path with Seating & Lighting - COMING SOON!
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Vermillion Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
